body:
Comment 4 by **stanislav.vorobyev**: 
Hello! 
Got the same problem in the latest weekly build (but on linux):
$ hg identify
43cf9b39b647 weekly/weekly.2012-02-14
$ set  | grep -a GO
GOROOT=/home/vissi/go
$ uname -a
Linux 3.0.0-12-server #20-Ubuntu SMP Fri Oct 7 16:36:30 UTC 2011 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64
GNU/Linux

$ ./all.bash
...
go tool dist: FAILED: /home/vissi/go/pkg/tool/linux_amd64/6g -o $WORK/_go_.6 -p runtime
-+ /home/vissi/go/src/pkg/runtime/debug.go /home/vissi/go/src/pkg/runtime/error.go
/home/vissi/go/src/pkg/runtime/extern.go /home/vissi/go/src/pkg/runtime/mem.go
/home/vissi/go/src/pkg/runtime/runtime_defs.go
/home/vissi/go/src/pkg/runtime/softfloat64.go /home/vissi/go/src/pkg/runtime/type.go
/home/vissi/go/src/pkg/runtime/zgoarch_amd64.go
/home/vissi/go/src/pkg/runtime/zgoos_linux.go
/home/vissi/go/src/pkg/runtime/zruntime_defs_linux_amd64.go
/home/vissi/go/src/pkg/runtime/zversion.go
